posts.post_content:
This is a very difficult card to think about parting with......:o

I'm feeling out the waters and right now taking trade, cash, or combo cash /trade for this card.....

This is an AMAZING TRUE NO NAME CARD!:eek:

all companies now are skittish on slabbing any 206 as "no name"....but this is it!

SGC did not know how to grade this, they simply put "MISSING RED INK" on the flip...many years ago I had it graded...


I have had this many, many years and was acquired with some other printers scraps that were pre production INCREDIBLES!  WOW!!

Card is "super creepy"  and in the name caption field looks like an "inked" "BOO" or 000 or something.....extremely unique...no name.....extreme color missing.....hand cut borders.....SGC graded "AUTH" "missing red  ink" 

someone please post a regular Abbott for comparison....


interested right now in rare backs(bl 350, cb, uzit, lenox, red hin), Cobbs, variations(dem, oh), super rare T206...ect ect...




GET A SUPER RARE ONE OF A KIND CARD!  a piece of history here....
shoot me an offer !  

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]



please see scans



EMAIL FOR RAW HI RES SCANS!


Thanks for looking...

Peace

Johnny
Thanks my friend! YOU ARE A GENUIS!:)
Johnny, That's a great card!  Eerie since it's Abbott.  That dude looks intense!
thanks my friend......awesome card.....this is so unique.....someone  will love this card:D
